sen.j: 栗山 潜鋒（くりやま せんぽう、1671年 - 1706年）は、江戸時代中期の朱子学者。
sen.e: Senpo KURIYAMA (1671 - 1706) was a Neo-Confucian scholar who lived during the middle of the Edo period.

sen.e: In 1692, he was invited by Mitsukuni TOKUGAWA, the lord of the Mito Domain, and then he worked for the compilation of "Dainihonshi" (The Great History of Japan) with Kanran MIYAKE and Tanpaku ASAKA.
